personal.name: Keyur Jivani
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.bio: Results-driven Full Stack Developer with a strong foundation in software engineering and a passion for building modern, user-centric web applications. Skilled in crafting scalable solutions, solving complex problems, and adapting quickly to new technologies. Brings a proactive mindset and a focus on continuous learning to every team environment.
personal.companyBio: Welcome to our innovative IT company! We specialize in delivering cutting-edge software solutions that transform businesses and drive digital growth. Our expert team combines technical excellence with creative problem-solving to build scalable, modern applications that exceed expectations.

description: Developed scalable SaaS and on-premises enterprise applications using modern web frameworks, RESTful APIs, and relational databases.
Designed and implemented multi-tenant architecture ensuring company-wide data isolation and client-specific configuration panels.
Utilized Dapper ORM with stored procedures to optimize high-performance data access
Managed IIS deployments and handled environment-specific configurations across local, testing, and production environments
Spearheaded role-based access control (RBAC) ensuring secure and modular user permission management
Participated actively in Scrum ceremonies including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, demo presentations, and retrospectives to review progress, discuss challenges, and identify improvement
Developed a healthcare service platform using ASP.NET Core MVC, ORM tools, and PostgreSQ database
Built modules for patient requests, doctor scheduling, and admin management
Applied Entity Framework Code First for database modeling, migrations, and schema management
Collaborated within an Agile Scrum team, focusing on clean code practices and continuous delivery

projects.title: Accounting & Inventory Management System
description: Engineered a robust multi-tenant platform for SaaS and on-premise models, adopted by 100% of clients.
Streamlined core modules including accounting, inventory, and loyalty programs, handling 90% of client operations.
Optimized SQL operations using Dapper with stored procedures, improving backend performance by 5%.
Integrated SFTP-based file management for upload, storage, and retrieval; eliminated server-side auto-sync logic and improved file handling performance by 30%.
Reduced server CPU load by 10% and improved server response time by 30% through asynchronous operations and resource decoupling.
Integrated code linting and static analysis tools in Angular and .NET projects, improving code maintainability by 10% and creating a 30% more developer-friendly codebase.
Upgraded tech stack from .NET Core 3.1 to .NET 8 and Angular 8 to Angular 16, improving maintainability and modern compatibility by 40%.
Deployed Web Workers and Inline Workers in Angular to offload heavy processing and make UI 30% more responsive and non-blocking.

projects.title: Healthcare Portal
description: Developed and deployed role-based access modules for patients, doctors, and admins, improving workflow efficiency by 25%.
Integrated secure login and consultation workflows aligned with healthcare compliance standards
Utilized Entity Framework (Database First) for efficient PostgreSQL schema mapping and database operations
Optimized data handling, reducing query execution time by 10% through stored procedure improvements

projects.title: Employee Learning Management System (SaaS)
description: Built scalable modules for course management, training tracking, and reading time analytics, enhancing learning insights by 30%.
Architected multi-tenant architecture ensuring company-wise data isolation and security.
Reduced API calls and improved backend performance by 5% through query optimization and logic refinement.
Added Angular Inline Web Workers to handle complex tasks in the background, reducing UI freezing by 10%.
Adopted Agile/Scrum methodology for iterative delivery, contributing to 90% on-time sprint completion.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Engineering
